root.name: Avernum: Escape from the Pit
root.description: OverviewAvernum: Escape from the Pit is a role playing game developed and published by Spiderweb Software for the iPad, PC, and Mac platforms.A remake of a remake, Avernum: Escape from the Pit takes the original Exile: Escape from the Pit remake, Avernum, and ports it to the new and improved Avadon engine.LinksOfficial WebsiteWindows/Macintosh system requirementsPC Running Windows XP or later or Macintosh running System 10.4 or later800 MhZ processor. Minimum 1.6 GhZ processor recommended.Video card or processor with OpenGL support and 32 MB video RAM (64 MB recommended).512 MB RAM, and 200 MB hard disk space.1024x600 screen resolution with 32 bit color.
